titleStmt.title: The Marquiss De Grana, the King of Spain's vice-roy in the Spanish-Netherlands, his mandatory letter to all commanders, officers, and soldiers, to resist the French, and repel force with force. Done out of the original from Brussels.
titleStmt.author: Grana, Ottone Enrico dal Carretto, Marquis of.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for R. Baldwin, in the Old-Bailey,

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: O.H.M. D'alcaretto, i.e. Otto-Henry, Marquis of Carretto et Grana.
reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
